attributes.action: Make pads, tampons and any other period product free
attributes.additional_details: Because pads should be free for all girls and it isn’t right for the girls to suffer if they can’t afford them
attributes.background: Put free pads and tampons in women’s toilets instead of the ridiculous price

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301619
